alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 6:05PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHEMUNG...CHENANGO...TIOGA... BROOME...DELAWARE...SUSQUEHANNA...NORTHERN WAYNE...AND BRADFORD COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of 30 MPH and greater which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 603 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Windham to Chenango Bridge to near Elmira and moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Binghamton, Elmira, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Southport, Barton, Big Flats, Horseheads and Kirkwood. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 50 and 57, and between 62 and 90. Interstate 88 between 1 and 9. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 230. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
